Cincinnati is one such city.

It was in April of 2001 that Cincinnati police Officer Stephen Roach fatally shot 19-year-old Timothy Thomas in the city's Over-the-Rhine neighborhood, an area then in deep decline.
Thomas, who had a record of minor traffic offenses, had a warrant out for his arrest.
